mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.applicant AS "applicant", a.department AS "department", a.matter AS "matter", a.process AS "process", a.receiver AS "receiver", a.solution AS "solution", a.donedate AS "donedate", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO szl_repairmgt( applicant, department, matter, process, receiver, solution, donedate, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{applicant}, #{department}, #{matter}, #{process}, #{receiver}, #{solution}, #{donedate}, #{status}, #{createBy.loginName}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE szl_repairmgt SET applicant = #{applicant}, department = #{department}, matter = #{matter}, process = #{process}, receiver = #{receiver}, solution = #{solution}, donedate = #{donedate}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.loginName}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
